channel.title: CVE Feed for ovirt-engine -- ovirt-engine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ovirt-engine -- ovirt-engine

item.title: CVE-2013-4367|2024-08-06T16:38:01.926Z -- ovirt-engine -- ovirt-engine
item.description: ovirt-engine 3.2 running on Linux kernel 3.1 and newer creates certain files world-writeable due to an upstream kernel change which impacted how python's os.chmod() works when passed a mode of '-1'.
